name: Arnold's Antiques
description:
Global Game Jam 2020 - Team trash bandits 

A fast paced local player vs player (controllers required) game where players have 20 seconds to repair or destroy as many antiques in the shop as possible! The winner in the player with the most objects of their type left in the shop after the 20 seconds are up. Play as either Arnold the shop keep who is trying to fix all his precious antiques or as Karen who is unreasonably angry and wants to take it out on all the items in the shop.   

WARNING: the main menu goes invisible after the first game but its still there, press A to play again or down and A to quit.
